entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
